price: If you call them to guidance, they do not hear, and you see them looking at you, but they do not see.
arabic: وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
